nodes.text: Doctor Zaly was a male individual who was a Separatist researcher. According to Adjutant General Wilhuff Tarkin, Zaly had remarkable success in analyzing the internal structure of kyber crystals using and building upon the original research done by the scientist Marsabi.  He also formulated Zaly's theory, which hypothesized that a vast amount of power from kyber crystals can be stored in a physical space. Galen Erso refuted this idea in his discussion with Tarkin, calling it "flawed" and that there's "simply no way to contain that much power."
